content.raw:
The utorso link w/o backpack is commented out ... hence the only defined link is the one w/ backpack.
The head (multisense) is defined separately in the ``multisense_sl_description`` package and added in the [respective robot xacro](#!/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/370/new-atlas-model/diff#chg-atlas_description/robots/atlas_v3_sandia_hands.urdf.xacro), just like for the old atlas model.

What's missing in the pull-request is an atlas_v3 version with no hands.
content.html:
The utorso link w/o backpack is commented out ... hence the only defined link is the one w/ backpack. The head (multisense) is defined separately in the multisense_sl_description package and added in the respective robot xacro, just like for the old atlas model.

What's missing in the pull-request is an atlas_v3 version with no hands.
